entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
